Title: Requires that applications submitted by individuals with developmental disabilities for eligibility determinations and service authorizations be processed in a timely manner
Summary: Requires that applications submitted by individuals with developmental disabilities for eligibility determinations and service authorizations be processed in a timely manner; provides that where such application is not reasonably clear or omits required information or where the office reasonably suspects fraud based on specific information available, the office shall notify the applicant in writing requesting the specific information needed to process such application; removes reporting requirements.
LawCode: Amd ยง13.07, Ment Hyg L (as proposed in S.8442 & A.9920)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring that applications submitted by individuals with developmental disabilities for eligibility determinations and service authorizations be processed in a timely manner
